library(tidyverse)

## Data

Data from GapMinder

Explanatory Variable: CO2 Total Emissions (<http://gapm.io/dco2_consumption_historic>)

Response Variable: Storm affected annual number (<https://www.emdat.be/database>)

```{r}
emissions <- read_csv("co2_cons.csv")
#194 rows (countries), 224 columns(1800 - 2022)

storms <- read_csv("storm_affected_annual_number.csv")
#179 rows (countries), 40 columns (1970 - 2008)
```

# 2. Data Cleaning

```{r}
#pivot longer (each row identified by a country and a year)
emissions_long <- emissions |> 
  mutate(across(.cols = '1800':'2022',
                .fns = ~ as.numeric(.x, na.rm = TRUE))) |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = '1800':'2022', 
               names_to = "year", 
               values_to = "emissions")

storms_long <- storms |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = '1970':'2008', 
               names_to = "year", 
               values_to = "people_affected")

#left_join with storm as left dataset (more restricted)
df.clean <- storms_long |> 
  left_join(emissions_long, join_by(country, year)) |> 
  group_by()

```
